mapper.select: SELECT album_storage.album_no AS albumNo, album_storage.stock AS stock, e.employee_no AS employeeNo, s.store_name FROM album_storage LEFT JOIN employee e ON album_storage.employee_no = e.employee_no LEFT JOIN store s ON album_storage.employee_no = s.employee_no WHERE e.employee_no = #{number}
